definition: ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people
weight/number/code/to pile/to stack/classifier for length or distance (yard), happenings etc
four corner code (input method for Chinese characters)
number plate/car license plate/CL:條|条[tiao2],塊|块[kuai4],片[pian4]
variant of 身份證號碼|身份证号码[shen1 fen4 zheng4 hao4 ma3]/I.D. number

sentences.english: I think he lives at No. 23 West Street, but I'm not sure about the number.
sentences.chinese: 我想他住在西大街23號，但是我對號碼不確定。

sentences.english: By the way, the number of the telephone on your desk is extension 506.
sentences.chinese: 順便說一下，你桌上的電話號碼是分機506。

sentences.english: Okay. Do you have our fax number?
sentences.chinese: 好的。你有沒有我們的傳真號碼呢？

sentences.english: Before you drop the bafl into the spinntng well, you bet a number on the layout.
sentences.chinese: 在你把小球投入轉盤之前，先在佈局上賭個號碼。

sentences.english: Why did you change your mobile phone number suddenly?
sentences.chinese: 你爲什麼突然間換電話號碼？

sentences.english: The telephone operator who looks up telephong(telephone) numbers uses a computer.
sentences.chinese: 電話接線員使用電腦來查詢電話號碼。

sentences.english: And just below, there was a toll free number to call with disputes.
sentences.chinese: 就在那行字下面，有個反饋異議的免費號碼。

sentences.english: Sorry, Idon't [take] his telephone numbers [with] me.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，我沒有帶他的電話號碼。

sentences.english: How to modify a contact number in address book programatically?
sentences.chinese: 如何修改地址簿程序聯繫號碼嗎？

sentences.english: Don't run your mind games on me, that's my number! What's this bozo 's name?
sentences.chinese: 別對我胡說八道，這是我的號碼，那傢伙叫什麼名字？

sentences.english: Your room number is 2602 on the sixth floor.
sentences.chinese: 您的房間號碼是五層的2602。

sentences.english: Who, at the peak of happiness, can remember the number of Cupid.
sentences.chinese: 在幸福的峯巔，誰還記得住愛神的電話號碼。

sentences.english: If you do not have a VTCRN / Staff No. , please fill in HKID No…
sentences.chinese: 如你沒有職訓局僱員編號，請填上香港身份證號碼。

sentences.english: Is your new number one starting to lay it on a little to thick?
sentences.chinese: 是你的新號碼一開始，奠定它在一個小到厚呢？

sentences.english: You will need to take a number slip and wait for your turn.
sentences.chinese: 你需要先抽號碼牌，並依序等候服務。

sentences.english: That's for sure. I am betting on my lucky number again.
sentences.chinese: 我在猜，你大概也很想知道每天的彩票開獎號碼了？

definition: weight/number/code/to pile/to stack/classifier for length or distance (yard), happenings etc
to transmit/to dispatch/to issue (an official document or credential)
to fill in a form/to write data in a box (on a questionnaire or web form)
to sign (one's name with a pen etc)/to autograph/signature
